name: Fight The Dragon - A Mini Action RPG + Construction Kit
blurb: Explore, Battle & Loot in this GAUNTLET inspired hack'n slash, or create & share Adventures like a true Dungeon Master of old!

rewards.reward:
EARLY ADVENTURER : Early Bird
=============================
Digital copy of the game on launch on Windows, OSX & Linux
=============================
Redeems 1x Steam key or 1x DRM Free build (Via Humble Store)

ADVENTURER
=============================
Digital copy of the game on launch on Windows, OSX & Linux
=============================
Redeems 1x Steam key or 1x DRM Free build (Via Humble Store)

HERO : Beta Access
=============================
Early access to the game via Steam once it hits Beta - Windows, OSX & Linux
=============================
Redeems 1x Steam key
+ Bonus Cubemen2 Steam Key

EARLY PIONEER : Early Bird Alpha
=============================
Early access to the game via Steam once it hits Alpha - Windows, OSX & Linux
=============================
Redeems 1x Steam key for Alpha
+ Bonus Cubemen2 Steam Key

PIONEER : Alpha Access
=============================
Early access to the game via Steam once it hits Alpha - Windows, OSX & Linux
=============================
Redeems 1x Steam key
+ Bonus Cubemen2 Steam Key

THE GRAVESTONE
=============================
Get your name on a gravestone in our Heroes Graveyard - A full 3D level in-game that you can explore. You also get to add a 140 character epitaph.
=============================
+ Everything from the Alpha tier + Hand written and sign personalised FTD postcard mailed to you.
============================= We reserve the right to veto profanity.

THE SARCOPHAGUS
=============================
Get your name on a Sarcophagus in our Heroes Graveyard - A full 3D level in-game that you can explore. You also get to add a 140 character epitaph. 
=============================
+ Everything from the Alpha tier + Hand written and sign personalised FTD postcard mailed to you.
============================= We reserve the right to veto profanity

THE TOMB
=============================
Get your name on a Large Tomb in our Heroes Graveyard - A full 3D level in-game that you can explore. You also get to add a 140 character epitaph. 
=============================
+ Everything from the Alpha tier + Hand written and sign personalised FTD postcard mailed to you.
============================= We reserve the right to veto profanity

HEAD START
=============================
Get your face likeness created as a player character head in game, including your hair style.
=============================
+  Everything from the Alpha tier + Hand written and signed personalised FTD postcard mailed to you.

WEAPON MASTER
=============================
Design and Name a Weapon that will be used in game as equip-able loot + design credit in game
=============================
+ Everything from the Alpha tier + FTD poster that has a hand written and signed thank you on the back mailed to you.
============================= 
Name & Design within reason, no profanity.

LEGENDARY ARMORER
=============================
Design and name a complete set of Armor (helmet, chest, shoulders, gloves and boots) that will be used in game as equip-able loot + design credit in game
=============================
+ Everything from the Alpha tier + FTD poster that has a hand written and signed thank you on the back mailed to you.
============================= 
Name & Design within reason, no profanity.

BOSS TRAINER
=============================
Design and name a Mini-Boss - Work with us to create a visual design, behaviour set and name for a unique Mini-Boss + design credit in game
=============================
+ Everything from the Alpha tier + FTD poster that has a hand written and signed thank you on the back mailed to you.
============================= 
Name & Design within reason, no profanity.

DRAGON MASTER
=============================
Name our Dragon. You will be listed in the game credits as the Dragon namer as well as have your name and the Dragon's name put on the Dragon shrine in the Hero's Graveyard + design credit in game
=============================
+ Everything from the Alpha tier + One of a kind FTD poster that has a hand written and signed thank you on the back mailed to you.
============================= 
Name within reason, no profanity.
